attributes.action: Ask the serious fraud office to investigate MP's expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The serious fraud department of the police must be asked to investigate the expense claims of members of parliament. The general public will not except anything less.Benefit cheats will see the actions of MP's as a green light to continue.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
